synopsis.text:
Higa Natsumi, Kamikura Fuyune, and the bicycle enthusiast, Akizuki Tomoe, welcome Maiharu Hiromi to Kamakura, a picturesque city where high school girls share a common passion - cycling! Hiromi, having recently moved from Nagasaki, finds herself in a new environment, attending Minami Kamakura High School and rediscovering her love for cycling after many years.

On her first day of school, Hiromi's rusty cycling skills become evident as she nearly collides with Tomoe. Sensing Hiromi's potential and eagerness to improve, Tomoe takes her under her wing, offering guidance and support. This chance encounter marks the beginning of a strong friendship between the two girls.

As they delve deeper into the world of cycling, Hiromi, Tomoe, Natsumi, and Fuyune stumble upon the remnants of a once-thriving bicycle club at their school. United by their shared enthusiasm, the girls decide to revive the club, renaming it the Minami Kamakura High School Girls Bicycle Club.

Join these spirited high school girls as they embark on thrilling cycling adventures, exploring the beautiful city of Kamakura while fostering unbreakable bonds and creating lasting memories.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
